item.description:
The Secular Society of MIT has recently been revived. If you're a member of the MIT community -- or if you're a Boston Atheist, and just want to show them a little support -- you're more than welcome to join the SSOMIT crowd this Saturday for a clean-up of the Esplanade.

The group will meet in front of the Student Center on Mass Ave (near the statue of the person made out of letters) at 11:15am, and leave shortly thereafter for the short walk to the river.

If you are can attend, please send Dan Harris an email -- via dmh at math[dot]mit[dot]edu -- by 5 PM Thursday. He needs a final headcount for Friday morning, so he can arrange for the right number of gloves and tools.

For more information about SSOMIT, visit http://www.mit.edu/~ssomit.
item.name: Esplanade Cleanup with Secular Society of MIT
